snippet: With 2012 shaping up to be such a volatile election environment, it is essentially every man for himself and both the Obama White House and Democrats on Capitol Hill will do what they consider to be in their best interests as the year progresses.
abstract: With 2012 shaping up to be such a volatile election environment, it is essentially every man for himself and both the Obama White House and Democrats on Capitol Hill will do what they consider to be in their best interests as the year progresses.
lead_paragraph: A few days after the White House made clear that President Obama intended to spend much of 2012 pounding Congress as an obstacle to progress, Senator John Cornyn, Republican of Texas, posed a question via Twitter.

headline.main: As He Takes Aim at Congress, Obama Risks Hitting Democrats
